title: Roblox Reports First Quarter 2022 Financial Results - Yahoo Finance
content: Roblox Reports First Quarter 2022 Financial Results  Yahoo Finance
description: SAN MATEO, Calif., May 10, 2022--Roblox Corporation (NYSE: RBLX), a global platform bringing millions of people together through shared experiences, released its first quarter 2022 financial results today and separately posted a letter to shareholders and supplemental materials on the Roblox investor relations website at ir.roblox.com.
